divs: Sighting DetailsMy roommate called me outside while he was smoking a cigarette. When I stepped out on to the porch, I saw a glowing red orb traveling across the sky from east to west. This aircraft was completely silent. I watched in amazement for a short time,; then it changed directions to north north-west, and increased to a speed that i've never seen any aircraft travel. It quickly disappeared from sight. What is also interesting is that about the time it changed directions, I saw another aircraft, which looked military, appear from the south and seemed as if it were following the "orb". While in the service I was stationed at the largest Marine air-base which is located in Yuma, AZ. I have seen lots of aircraft, but this was completely unexplainable.
Summary: Glowing red Orb w/ transparent ring around it.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Arcata
There were no other sightings in Arcata on or around January 6th 2008
